description: A large, luxurious casino in Rainbase, Alabasta, owned and operated by Crocodile as his secret base of operations for Baroque Works. The casino serves as a front for his criminal activities and contains hidden chambers including a prison with Seastone cages.

keyEvents.title: Rain Dinners Debut - The Trap
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates infiltrate Rain Dinners casino to confront Crocodile, but fall into his elaborate trap and are imprisoned in a Seastone cage.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces Crocodile's main base of operations and the location where Operation Utopia is revealed.

keyEvents.title: Operation Utopia Revealed at Rain Dinners
keyEvents.description: Crocodile reveals his master plan, Operation Utopia, to destroy the Alabasta Kingdom from his base at Rain Dinners.
keyEvents.significance: Rain Dinners serves as the location where the true extent of Crocodile's conspiracy is unveiled.

statusHistory.reason: Casino is operational as Crocodile's base

description: A city in Alabasta Kingdom known for its casino district. Despite its name, Rainbase is located in a desert region and rarely receives rain. It houses the famous Rain Dinners casino owned by Crocodile.

keyEvents.title: Confrontation at Rainbase
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats arrive in Rainbase to confront Crocodile at his Rain Dinners casino.
keyEvents.significance: The city serves as the setting for the confrontation between the Straw Hats and Crocodile.
